nome: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga.

The World Isn't So Kind as to Allow One-Sided Attacks
The Fact That You're Watching This Video...
I'm Not So Rude as to Complain After Being Saved
Standard Opening of Gate Number One Confirmed
It's Like a Class Full of People Who Only Want to Save Themselves

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga.
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: My Instant Death Ability is So Overpowered, No One in This Other World Stands a Chance Against Me!
metadata_completo.sinopse:
During a school trip, a bus full of students is suddenly transported to another world by a sage named Sion. She bestows most of the students with powers called Gifts, seeking to recruit them to become sages as well. However, a few are excluded from receiving a Gift, resulting in the others leaving them behind.

Yogiri Takatou, one of the students who did not receive a Gift, wakes up to find a dragon attacking the bus. Amidst the chaos, he executes the dragon using his innate ability to instantly put anything to death. Alongside fellow survivor Tomochika Dannoura, Takatou sets out to find a way back to Earth, all while eliminating anyone who dares to underestimate himâ€”including his former classmates.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
